data.questText: I still don't have the source figured out, but there's another oddity I'd have you investigate. There are lava fissures opening up all across the Escalade Islands. I don't think you can stop them all, but if you can collapse a handful of them, 5 or so, it will slow the damage.
data.completeText: Great work collapsing those vents. But even better, while you were out I found our source!
